attributes.action: Introduce legislation so that those whose travel plans are put in jeapordy by strike action receive full compenation from the Unions and members calling the strike.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In the run up to Christmas 2009 the Unite Union is calling out on Strike cabin staff employed by British Airways.

This will impact on the travel plans of some 1,000,000 people and their families and friends.

The irreponsible actions of a small number of perople cannot be allowed to effect the majority.

If travel plans have to be altered than those directly responsible, the uniolons and their members, should be legally responsible for the cost to the traveller both the direct cost of loss of travel, and the indirect cost of loss of enjoyment ot the holiday.
